## Toolbox.shouldSelectItem\_() method

Decides whether the new item should be selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected shouldSelectItem_(oldItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null, newItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md) \| null | The previously selected toolbox item. |
|  newItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md) \| null | The newly selected toolbox item. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the new item should be selected, false otherwise.
